EmailTemplate.name: Approval Notification for Override request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Eligibility_Rule__c.Program_Name__c} Eligibility Override Request - needs your Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
{!Eligibility_Rule__c.Program_Name__c} Eligibility Override Request for {!Eligibility_Rule__c.Account__c} account has been submitted for your approval by {!Override_Request__c.OwnerFullName}. Please click here to access the record and approve.
Thanks, ConEdison
